articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: ISRO develops android app for computing solar energy potential - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) on Monday said its Ahmedabad-based Space Applications Centre has developed an android app for computing the solar energy potential of a place.
